member.name: HTTP_MULTIPLE_KNOWN_HEADERS
member.summary: The HTTP_MULTIPLE_KNOWN_HEADERS structure specifies the headers that are included in an HTTP response when more than one header is required.

member.name: HTTP_MULTIPLE_KNOWN_HEADERS.HeaderId
member.summary: A member of the enumeration specifying the response header ID.

summary.para: The flags corresponding to the response header in the HeaderId member. This member is used only when the WWW-Authenticate header is present. This can be zero or the following:

listheader.description: The specified order of authentication schemes is preserved on the challenge response.

member.name: HTTP_MULTIPLE_KNOWN_HEADERS.KnownHeaderCount
member.summary: The number of elements in the array specified in the KnownHeaders member.

member.name: HTTP_MULTIPLE_KNOWN_HEADERS.KnownHeaders
member.summary: A pointer to the first element in the array of structures.
